import React from 'react'; function Sessions({ sessionSelection, toggleSlider }) { const sessions = [ { name: "Frontend Development", score: "9.50", lastSession: "3 Nov 22", type: "FND" }, { name: "Backend Development", score: "9.45", lastSession: "3 Oct 23", type: "FE" }, { name: "FullStack Development", score: "9.45", lastSession: "3 Oct 23", type: "FE" }, ]; return (
{/* Header with tabs */}
{/* Table Header */}
Session Name
Score
Last session
{/* Session List */} {sessions.map((session, index) => (
{session.type}
{session.name}
{session.score}
{session.lastSession}
))}
); } export default Sessions;
